Name: Zumou Battoru
About the game: The game contains 2 different modes: - Road to champion - Last stand Road to champion is a short story, where you play against different wrestlers to claim the title of sumo champion. Last stand is a survival based platform, where you have to knock endless rounds of wrestlers out off the ring. You get points for every wrestler knocked out off bounce, so if you want to challenge yourself, then you can try to aim for a remarkable highscore. This mode can only be unlocked once the Road to champion mode has been cleared.
